price: Ka sε: “Monyε sotie ma Nyankopͻn, na monyε sotie ma Ɔsomafoͻ no nso. Na sε modane mo ho fri (Nokorε no ho) a, (Ɔsomafoͻ) no deε n’asεdeε ne deε yεde asoa no no, εna monso modeε ne deε yεde asoa mo. Sε moyε sotie ma no a na mobɛnya kwankyerε. Ɔsomafoͻ no adwuma ne sε, ͻbεbͻ asεm no ho dawuro akyerεkyerε mu.
arabic: قُلۡ أَطِيعُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُواْ ٱلرَّسُولَۖ فَإِن تَوَلَّوۡاْ فَإِنَّمَا عَلَيۡهِ مَا حُمِّلَ وَعَلَيۡكُم مَّا حُمِّلۡتُمۡۖ وَإِن تُطِيعُوهُ تَهۡتَدُواْۚ وَمَا عَلَى ٱلرَّسُولِ إِلَّا ٱلۡبَلَٰغُ ٱلۡمُبِينُ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qul aṭīʿū al-laha wa-aṭīʿū al-rasūla fa-in tawallaw fa-innamā ʿalayhi mā ḥummila waʿalaykum mā ḥummil'tum wa-in tuṭīʿūhu tahtadū wamā ʿalā al-rasūli illā al-balāghu al-mubīnu
